steps.title: Buy Essential Gear
steps.description: Purchase essential items from the merchant at the Church of Elleh. This includes the Crafting Kit, Torch, and other useful items.

steps.title: Obtain Limgrave West Map Fragment
steps.description: Find the map fragment in the western part of Limgrave to reveal the area on your map.

steps.title: Visit the First Step Site of Grace
steps.description: Activate the First Step Site of Grace and meet Melina to obtain your horse, Torrent.

steps.title: Defeat the Tree Sentinel
steps.description: Optional boss fight. The Tree Sentinel patrols the path to the Church of Elleh.

steps.title: Visit the Church of Elleh
steps.description: Meet Ranni and obtain the Spirit Calling Bell and Lone Wolf Ashes.

steps.title: Clear Gatefront Ruins
steps.description: Defeat the enemies and obtain the Whetstone Knife and Storm Stomp Ash of War.

steps.title: Defeat the Beastman of Farum Azula
steps.description: Optional boss in the Groveside Cave. Drops the Flamedrake Talisman.

steps.title: Visit the Waypoint Ruins
steps.description: Find Sellen and begin the Sorceress questline.

steps.title: Clear the Murkwater Cave
steps.description: Defeat Patches and obtain the Grovel for Mercy gesture.

steps.title: Defeat the Stonedigger Troll
steps.description: Optional boss in the Limgrave Tunnels. Drops the Roar Medallion.

steps.title: Visit the Third Church of Marika
steps.description: Find the Flask of Wondrous Physick and Sacred Tear.

steps.title: Defeat the Flying Dragon Agheel
steps.description: Optional boss in the Dragon-Burnt Ruins. Drops the Dragon Heart.
